docs.snippet: LEAD: IT'S always great to hear something positive, especially in a season that hasn't been studded with hits. The something positive in this case is a new theater, a dream come true for a 26-year-old theater buff who believes that Broadway became...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: IT'S always great to hear something positive, especially in a season that hasn't been studded with hits. The something positive in this case is a new theater, a dream come true for a 26-year-old theater buff who believes that Broadway became what it was because of young innovators and young blood.

docs.snippet: LEAD: Dustin Hoffman said he doubted whether he, Robert De Niro or Al Pacino - all of whom were sitting at the same dinner table - would ever have become actors if it hadn't been for Elia Kazan....

docs.snippet: LEAD: ''I HAVE a last name, but I'm not going to use it until I'm 21,'' said 20-year-old Walter S., who got into fashion at age 13 as a Seventh Avenue sketch artist. Three years later, he began publishing a photocopied fashion magazine, Key, which...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: ''I HAVE a last name, but I'm not going to use it until I'm 21,'' said 20-year-old Walter S., who got into fashion at age 13 as a Seventh Avenue sketch artist. Three years later, he began publishing a photocopied fashion magazine, Key, which led to his becoming a fashion stylist and a feisty fashion columnist, taking swipes at Seventh Avenue in New York Talk.
